casebody.data:
The RITZ-CARLTON DEVELOPMENT COMPANY, INC., et al, petitioners,
v.
Krishna NARAYAN, et al. No. 15-378. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 11, 2016.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Hawaii. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Hawaii for further consideration in light of DIRECTV, Inc. v. Imburgia, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 463, --- L.E.2d ---- (2015).
